\name{Efficiency}
\alias{Efficiency}
\title{Efficiency}
\usage{
Efficiency <- (PLAYER_NAME, Efficiency)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{Efficiency}{Player efficiency rating stat}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to score efficiently
}
\examples{
Efficiency("Lebron James", 31.3)
}
